Posted By: nammertime (12/16/2009 10:25:27 AM)

posts.post_content:
You could simply Doom Blade something, but that's SOOO main stream. You could use Day of Judgement, but you don't want YOUR things to die, do you? You could maybe use Persuasion to simply take it the creature for yourself, but do you want that filthy thing in your house? Certainly not!   
  
The solution? An extremely convuluted and mana expensive, ahem, "removal" that uses mana that could have been spent on, say, ANYTHING ELSE! Such as Unsummon, making your opponent pay for it again. But if you're running this card, chances are you see absolutely no problems with whittling all your mana and can't understand how that's a bad thing.
posts.html:

The solution? An extremely convuluted and mana expensive, ahem, "removal" that uses mana that could have been spent on, say, ANYTHING ELSE! Such as Unsummon, making your opponent pay for it again. But if you're running this card, chances are you see absolutely no problems with whittling all your mana and can't understand how that's a bad thing.
